article_description: Presenting P tit Belliveau  lover of Acadian folk music  wearer of faded crocs and officiant in the marriage between plucky banjo and cheesy synthesizer  A Moncton  NB via Bayside  NS man boy who has played with a group called P tit Belliveau et les Grosses C
